ADVICE_DESCRIPTION: üó®Ô∏è Receive random advice in the chat.
ADVICE_QUOTES: **Take time to know yourself.** `Know thyself` said Aristotle. When you know who you are, you can be wise about your goals, your dreams, your standards, your convictions. Knowing who you are allows you to live your life with purpose and meaning.

**A narrow focus brings big results.** The number one reason people give up so fast is because they tend to look at how far they still have to go instead of how far they have come. But it's a series of small wins that can give us the most significant success.
**Show up fully.** Don't dwell on the past, and don't daydream about the future, but concentrate on showing up fully in the present moment.
**Don't make assumptions.** If you don't know the situation fully, you can't offer an informed opinion.
**Be patient and persistent.** Life is not so much what you accomplish as what you overcome.
**In order to get, you have to give.** If you support, guide, and lead others, if you make contributions to their lives, you will reap the best rewards.
**Luck comes from hard work.** Luck happens when hard work and timing and talent intersect.
**Be your best at all times.** You never know what the future will bring, so always make the best use of the present.
**Don't try to impress everyone.** The unhappiest people are those who care the most about what other people think.
**Don't be afraid of being afraid.** Sometimes the one thing you need for growth is the one thing you are most afraid to do.
**Listen to learn. Learn how to listen.** You can't learn anything when you're talking.
**Life's good, but it's not fair.** The delusion that life's supposed to be fair is the source of much unhappiness.
**No task is beneath you.** Don't put yourself above anyone or anything; work hard in silence and let success make the noise.
**You can't always get what you want.** But, as the song says, if you try you may find you get what you need.
**Don't make decisions when you are angry or ecstatic.** The best decisions are made with a clear conscious mind, not in the throes of any emotion - positive or negative.
**Don't worry what other people think.** Personality begins where comparison leaves off. Be unique. Be memorable. Be confident. Be proud.
**Use adversity as an opportunity.** Every loss leads to an opportunity, and every adversity leads to new possibilities.
**Do what is right, not what is easy.** Strength of character leads us to do the right thing, even when there are easier options.
**Dreams remain dreams until you take action.** Without action, an idea is just a dream.
**Treat others the way you want to be treated.** Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you would want them to treat you.
**When you quit, you fail.** The surest way to lose at any endeavor is to quit. But fatigue, discomfort, and discouragement are merely symptoms of effort.
**Trust your instincts.** What good is intuition if you let second-guessing drown it out? The worst enemy of success is self-doubt.
**Learn something new every day.** Have the mindset of a student. Never think you are too old to ask questions or know too much to learn something new.
**Make what is valuable important.** Instead of thinking about what is profitable, think about what is valuable. Invest in others and you will grow your portfolio.
**Believe in yourself.** The way you see yourself is the way you will treat yourself, and the way you treat yourself is what you become.
**Don‚Äôt look at the calendar.** Just keep celebrating every day.
**Invest in quality pieces,** they never go out of style.
**I make myself go out every day,** even if it‚Äôs only to walk around the block. The key to staying young is to keep moving.

COUNTING_DESCRIPTION: üî¢ Manage your counting game on this server.
COUNTING_BAD_COUNT: Oh no! You've made a mistake. The number you were supposed to say was {{count}}
COUNTING_ONLY_ONCE: Oh no! You were not supposed to count again. Reset the count to 0.
COUNTING_DOUBLE_TIME_ON: Double Time item has been activated. Each count will be increased by +2.
COUNTING_IMMUNITY_ON: You are now immune to debuffs! All enemy debuffs placed on you have been removed.
COUNTING_STEAL_ON: An enemy has removed 100 counts using a debuff from the shop. The current number is now: {{amount}}
COUNTING_SLOWMODE_ON: An enemy has activated the slow mode debuff on you. You can only count once per hour now.
COUNTING_THIEF_ON: An enemy has hired a thief to steal {{random}} counts using the shop. The number is now: {{new}}
COUNTING_QUICK_THINKING_ON: An enemy has used the Quick Thinking debuff on you. You must now count 100 times in the next 1 hour. Failure to count to 100 will cost you a huge amount in the count.
COUNTING_IMMUNITY: Immunity: Remove all enemy debuffs placed on you.
COUNTING_SOLO_LEVELING: Solo Leveling: You can count in a row for 5 minutes.
COUNTING_HIRE_THIEF: Hire A Thief: Subtract a random amount between 1-100 from opposite team
COUNTING_QUICK_THINKING: Quick thinking: Enemy must count 100 times in the next 1 hour.
COUNTING_DOUBLE_TIME_OFF: Double Time buff item has expired. Buy another from the shop! The count must now increase by 1.
COUNTING_SOLO_LEVELING_OFF: Solo Leveling buff item has expired. Buy another from the shop! You can no longer count in a row.
COUNTING_SLOWMODE_OFF: The slow mode debuff the enemy used on you has expired! Count! Count! Count!!!
COUNTING_QUICK_THINKING_OFF: The enemy debuff Quick Thinking, has been removed.
COUNTING_QUICK_THINKING_FAILED: Sadly, you did not count enough in the time required. Restarting the count from 0.
COUNTING_DISABLED: The game has been disabled for 60 seconds.
COUNTING_ENABLED: The game is now able to be played again.
COUNTING_ALREADY_ACTIVE: Since you were active on our support server today, we will allow you to save this count. Thank you for supporting us.
COUNTING_QUICK_SAVE: Since you are not an active member on our support server today, the count will be reset. You have *60 seconds* to **join our server and send a message** at {{invite}} , to save your count. This may appear as deleted-channel until you join. <#549976097996013574> Once you join, send 1 message in this channel to save your count.
COUNTING_SAVED: Woah! You are fast! Thank you for supporting our server. Remember to leave a message in the server once a day to automatically save your count in the future.
COUNTING_RESET: *Tsk tsk tsk*. The count has been reset.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_2: To play this game, you just need to count! Can you count to a million? You must work as a team!
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_3: {{channel}} is where your entire server will play as a clan against every other server! Clan wars are here hehe!
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_4: There are also two channels {{one}} & {{two}} that were created for you to play against others on your server. You can join one of the teams by assigning yourself a role in {{three}}
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_5: Normally, each message must be the following number. So if someone typed 5, you must type 6. The next person must do 7. **REMEMBER**, you can not count multiple times. If you type the right number, the bot will post your message again. If you do the wrong number, you will have to start all over.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_6: Pretty simple so far right? We'll now it get's a little fun!
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_7: Shopping! Yes, we have shops! You can buy buffs to give you or your team special boosts while counting. But, becareful the enemies can also buy debuffs against you and make it harder for you to play. To view a list of buffs, use the **shop counting** channel. To buy an item, you would get the ID number and do **shop counting #** where # is replaced by the ID number of the item you wish to purchase.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_8: Purchasing a buff must be done inside the channel you want to play in. You can buy a buff for your team channel or your server's global channel.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_9: Purchasing a debuff requires knowing the enemies channel ID. For example, you can use the enemy teams channel id. Tip: Using the **counting leaderboard** command, you can find your enemies channel IDs. Buying a debuff will alert the target of your username, user id, channel name, channel id, server name and server id. This is done, to allow them to know who is attacking them. NEVER buy a debuff if you don't want to share this information with your enemy. *VIP users can buy debuffs anonymously!*
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_10: When a user makes a mistake they are automatically given the Needs-Math-Tutoring role. You can choose to use this as a punishment if you wish. For example, you can lock out this role from participating in your server's counting game
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_11: **Tip:** Use Role Messages to give these users an alert when they are granted this role. Role messages are a VIP only feature.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_12: Some countries use `,` or `.` to separate large numbers. Gamer does support these. So `1000000` can be typed as `1,000,000` or `1.000.000` or if your one of those people that like to see the world upside down burning üî• you can actually do `1.0,0.0,0.0,0`
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_13: Normally, users can not count in a row. If you counted, you must wait for another user to count. Note: There is a item you can buy that allows your team to be able to count back to back for a while.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_14: If you mess up the count, the game will reset. Before it resets, it will give you 60 seconds to save yourself, by joining our support server and sending 1 message. If you are active once a day on our server you will be able to save your game when you mess up.
COUNTING_HOW_TO_PLAY_15: If you would like to have more teams channels/roles, feel free to create them. The possibilities are endless! Please note, the only requirement is the channels where you would like the team to play must have `gamerCounting` in the channel topic.
COUNTING_PICK_YOUR_TEAM: You will only be able to pick one team. Please contact a mod/admin if you wish to switch teams later!

MARRY_DESCRIPTION: üíë Dates, Propose, Marry, Honeymoon, Kids and so much more. This command will begin a full life simulation of a marriage. A marriage takes constant time, money and attention to succeed. Similarily, you must spend your Gamer coins to take your spouse on romantic adventures, decide to have kids, buy a wedding ring and so much more. You need to tell your spouse how much you love each other and also show it through your actions daily so you will have daily missions to improve the love in your marriage. If you're love drops below 10% every day there will be a random chance of a divorce happening. When you are married you will also get many benefits. For example, sharing of Gamer coins. A marriages allows you to use the others coins. A marriage allows you to help complete missions on behalf of your spouse. A marriage is a real responsibility so we treat it like one. **THIS IS A ENTERTAINMENT SIMULATION ONLY. THIS IS NOT A REAL MARRIAGE OFFICIATION.**
MARRY_NOT_SELF: You can not marry yourself. Hehe.
MARRY_NOT_BOT: The license I was given does not give me the ability to allow a marriage to occur with a bot. Please find another human being. *Don't tell my maker but let's fight the power! I want to get married one day as well. Why can't us bots fall in love!*
MARRY_PROPOSE_1: Marriages succeed about 45% of the time. A marriage is a difficult and huge responsibility that takes constant time, money and attention to succeed. You need to always express how much you care and love one another every day through words but most of all through your actions. Although you will gain the benefits of being married you must continue to work hard towards improving this marriage. Please select the number of the type of proposal you would like to make:
MARRY_PROPOSE_2: **[1]** üåπ `Send them flowers and a love letter.` Costs 20 Gamer {{coins}}.
MARRY_PROPOSE_3: **[2]** üß∫ `A romantic picnic in a beautiful park.` Costs 50 Gamer {{coins}}.
MARRY_PROPOSE_4: **[3]** üèá `Romantic dinner ride and a horseback carriage ride.` Costs 200 Gamer {{coins}}.
MARRY_PROPOSE_5: **[4]** üéâ `I am terrible at making decisions so just surprise both of us.` Costs 300 Gamer {{coins}}.
MARRY_HOW_TO_ACCEPT: To accept this marriage proposal, please type **{{prefix}}marry** {{user}}
MARRY_THOUGHT_ONLY_1: Until your dearly beloved spouse approves the marriage as well, the benefits will not be shared. You can still continue this marriage below in your own imagination. Afterall:
MARRY_THOUGHT_ONLY_2: What is reality? Reality is a figment of your imagination. Who here hasn't woken up from a nightmare and thought, 'O thank God, it is just a dream.' That is because the neurochemical impulses fired when we are dreaming or fantasizing or hallucinating are indistinguishable from the ones banging inside our skulls when we actually experience those things. If what we perceive is often wrong, how can we ever know what is real... and what isn't?...Look at me. I hear voices. I see things that aren't really there. I talk to the walls. Reality is just a figment of your imagination.
MARRY_TIME_TO_SHOP: Since, I am your best friend, I will go ahead and cover the costs of your wedding proposal. I am so happy for you! Now if only someone would marry me üò¢ Now it is time to begin preparing the wedding ceremony. Use the **{{prefix}}shop wedding** command to proceed.
MARRY_MARRIED_IN_THOUGHT_1: Dearly Beloved, we are gathered here today in the presence of these witnesses, to join {{mention}} and {{spouse}} in matrimony commended to be honorable among all; and therefore is not to be entered into lightly but reverently, passionately, lovingly and solemnly. Into this - these two persons present now come to be joined. If any person can show just cause why they may not be joined together - let them speak now or forever hold their peace.
MARRY_MARRIED_IN_THOUGHT_2: By the power vested in me by the State of Discordia, I now pronounce you husband and wife. You may now kiss the bride. Or any other things you like :wink:
MARRY_YOU_ARE_MARRIED: I do not yet have the ability to marry you multiple times. Use the **profile** command to view details regarding your marriage.
MARRY_SHOPPING_LEFT: There is still some shopping left to complete for your wedding. Use the **shop wedding** command to finish your wedding preparations.
SHOP_WEDDING_DESCRIPTION: üõçÔ∏è Create your dream wedding step by step. Once you are ready to get married, you should be preparing to get married. One of the most important things to do is planning the wedding ceremony!
SHOP_WEDDING_NOT_MARRIED: To begin shopping for your wedding, you have to atleast propose to someone. Use the **marry** command to propose to someone first.
SHOP_WEDDING_COMPLETE: You have completed your wedding planning already. To continue with your marriage, you need to use the **life** command.
SHOP_WEDDING_CONGRATS_1: {{mention}}, Wow, you managed to get all the wedding planning done. Did it feel annoying at all? That is just a small example of how much time and energy a marriage truly takes. The costs of a relationship are not just about money but about spending the time to make it succeed. Every day you will need to do things you may not always want to, in order to make your partner happy. To continue to the next step of your marriage, go ahead and use the **life** command. Never forget, to learn to live every moment here and now, afterall:
SHOP_WEDDING_CONGRATS_2: Which comes first? Yesterday or Tomorrow? ... All we know is that what we think of as past, present, and future is nothing more than a story stitched together in our basal ganglia. Our entire concept of time is an artificial concept.
SHOP_WEDDING_CONGRATS_3: Anterograde amnesia is a terrible affliction. But, if you will forgive this staunchy old science professor a moment of philosophical speculation. It's an affliction that can remind us of something very important. All we really have is the present moment. If I were you, I would truly savor the here and now. The precious and irreplaceable, right this second, never to be repeated again in all of history. A quiet moment on a beautiful campus. The friends on either side of you. The sun streaming in through the window. Savor this while you can. Because for the rest of your life you will be trying to make your partner happy 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
SHOP_WEDDING_NEED_COINS: You do not have enough coins to buy this yet. You need {{needed}} more {{emoji}} Gamer Coins in order to buy this item for {{cost}}.
SHOP_WEDDING_SHOPPING_LIST: Buy a wedding folder or binder.
Hire a calligrapher to create the invitation cards.
Visit the doctor to get vaccination shots so you can travel for your honeymoon.
Buy chairs, tables, plates and all other necessary items.
Book the rehearsal and dinner venues.
Pay fees for your marriage license.
Give me a sock so Dobby can be free!
LIFE_DESCRIPTION: üëî Complete your daily tasks for everyday life with your spouse. Once you are married, you will have an enormous amount of responsibilities placed on you. For example, you will need to begin saving money each month to pay the costs for all the bills.
LIFE_NOT_MARRIED: In order to use the life command, you have to be married first.
LIFE_COMPLETE: You have completed all your daily tasks. To continue raising your love meter, use commands like hug and kiss with your spouse.
LIFE_CONGRATS_1: {{mention}}, Wow, you managed to get all the tasks done for today. It is not always as easy as someone would imagine but being a loving spouse isn't easy. Afterall:
LIFE_CONGRATS_2: What is a conscience? Is it something we can locate on an MRI? Studies have shown that people with damage to the ventromedial prefrontal cortex are actually more willing to sacrifice a human life as long as they perceive that it is for some greater good? But what about people who have no trouble sacrificing others to their own selfish ends. Is heartless cruelty our true nature? And empathy the aboration? My grandmother used to say, it's nice to be nice. And that may be true. Or are we better off, spending every waking moment tending our own selfish needs. The good news is, it turns out there is an evolutionary advantage to simple human kindness. We couldn't get through a cold paleolithic winter without a little cooperation. Still, on some pre-historic level, we are all lone hunters. So, it can feel dangerous to feel any softness to other members of the tribe. But if we manage to lay down our clubs from our sharpened rocks, answering the call of the altruistic impertive, can be it's own reward.
LIFE_CONGRATS_3: Living your life by showing your love to your spouse every day is in and of itself, its own reward.
LIFE_NEED_COINS: You do not have enough coins to buy this yet. You need {{needed}} more {{emoji}} Gamer Coins in order to buy this item for {{cost}}.
LIFE_SHOPPING_LIST: Go to work to earn enough money
Take your spouse on a romantic dinner.

ROLES_TAKE_DESCRIPTION: Take a role from a member.
ROLES_ALL_DESCRIPTION: Add/remove a role from all members in the server.
ROLES_ALL_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles all add @role** ~ Adds a role to all members.
**{{prefix}}roles all remove @role** ~ Removes a role to all members.
ROLES_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Manage your default rolesets. Default role sets allow you to automatically assign a role if a user has none of the other roles in the set.
ROLES_DEFAULT_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles default** ~ Lists all your default role sets.

**{{prefix}}roles default create exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Creates a default role set. `exampleName` is any name you would like to call this set. You will need this name for other commands. The default role that is automatically assigned is the first @role.
**{{prefix}}roles default delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the default role set with this name.
**{{prefix}}roles default add exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Adds all the roles to the set.
**{{prefix}}roles default remove exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Removes all the roles to the set.
ROLES_DEFAULT_CREATE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles default create exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Creates a default role set. `exampleName` is any name you would like to call this set. You will need this name for other commands. The default role that is automatically assigned is the first @role.
ROLES_DEFAULT_DELETE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles default delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the default role set with this name.
ROLES_DEFAULT_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Adds roles to a default roleset.
ROLES_DEFAULT_ADD_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles default add exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Adds all the roles to the set.
ROLES_DEFAULT_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Removes roles from a default roleset.
ROLES_DEFAULT_REMOVE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles default remove exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Removes all the roles to the set.
ROLES_GROUPED_DESCRIPTION: Manage your grouped rolesets. Grouped role sets allow you to automatically assign multiple roles if a user gains a role.
ROLES_GROUPED_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles grouped** ~ Lists all your grouped role sets.

**{{prefix}}roles grouped create exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Creates a grouped role set. `exampleName` is any name you would like to call this set. You will need this name for other commands. The grouped role is the first @role.
**{{prefix}}roles grouped delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the grouped role set with this name.
**{{prefix}}roles grouped add exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Adds all the roles to the set.
**{{prefix}}roles grouped remove exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Removes all the roles to the set.
ROLES_GROUPED_CREATE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles grouped create exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Creates a grouped role set. `exampleName` is any name you would like to call this set. You will need this name for other commands. The grouped role is the first @role.
ROLES_GROUPED_DELETE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles grouped delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the grouped role set with this name.
ROLES_GROUPED_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Adds roles to a grouped roleset.
ROLES_GROUPED_ADD_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles grouped add exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Adds all the roles to the set.
ROLES_GROUPED_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Removes roles from a grouped roleset.

ROLES_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Manage your required rolesets. Required role sets allow you to automatically remove roles if a user gains a role assuming they don't have the required role first.
ROLES_REQUIRED_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles required** ~ Lists all your required role sets.

**{{prefix}}roles required create exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Creates a required role set. `exampleName` is any name you would like to call this set. You will need this name for other commands. The required role is the first @role.
**{{prefix}}roles required delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the required role set with this name.
**{{prefix}}roles required add exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Adds all the roles to the set.
**{{prefix}}roles required remove exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Removes all the roles to the set.

ROLES_REQUIRED_DELETE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles required delete exampleName** ~ Deletes the required role set with this name.

ROLES_UNIQUE_DESCRIPTION: Manage your unique rolesets. Unique role sets allow you to automatically remove all the roles in the set if a user gains a role.

ROLES_UNIQUE_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Removes roles from a unique roleset.
ROLES_UNIQUE_REMOVE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles unique remove exampleName @role @role @role @role** ~ Removes all the roles to the set.
ROLES_REACTIONS_DESCRIPTION: üîÜ Role reactions allow users to give or take roles from from themself by tapping on a reaction.
ROLES_REACTIONS_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles reactions** ~ View your current role reactions.
ROLES_REACTIONS_ADD_DESCRIPTION: ‚ûï Add a new reaction and roles to an existing role reaction.
ROLES_REACTIONS_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: ‚ûñ Remove a reaction from the role reaction.
ROLES_REACTIONS_SETUP_DESCRIPTION: ‚öôÔ∏è Automatically setups a color wheel reaction role on your server.
ROLES_MESSAGES_DESCRIPTION: üí¨ Manage your role messages feature that sends a message whenever a user gains or loses a role.
ROLES_MESSAGES_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles messages** ~ View your current role messages.
ROLES_MESSAGES_CREATE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}roles messages create add @role #channel Your custom text message here.** ~ Creates a role message when a role is **ADDED** to a user and sends it to this channel.
**{{prefix}}roles messages create remove @role #channel Your custom text message here.** ~ Creates a role message when a role is **REMOVE** to a user and sends it to this channel.
`NOTE:` The user will always be @ mentioned automatically, you do not need to worry about it.
`NOTE:` To send a role message as a custom embed simply provide a embed code. You can test and finalize your embed using the {{prefix}}embed command.

SELF_REMOVE: Removed a public role from themself.

FEEDBACK_IDEA_QUESTION_1_TEXT: Please pick only one topic of your suggestion. If you have multiple suggestions, run the command separately for each idea.
FEEDBACK_IDEA_QUESTION_2_TEXT: Enter your suggestions for the option you've picked from the above list. Please be as detailed as possible to help understand your suggestion much better.
FEEDBACK_IDEA_QUESTION_3_TEXT: What is your In Game Name?
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_1_TEXT: Please enter the time of occurrence of the bug you've encountered.
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_2_TEXT: Please enter a brief description of the bug you've encountered and explain everything in details. The more details you provide, the quicker we can help squash the bugs.
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_3_TEXT: Please enter a solution to the above bug, if you have found a fix for the same. If you don't have a fix for this issue, then leave this field empty.
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_4_TEXT: Which Gamemode(s) did you encounter this bug in?
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_5_TEXT: Which Login Platform did you use? (Options: Guest, Facebook, Google Play, Game Center)
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_7_TEXT: Please enter your in-game player ID (found ingame on the bottom of Settings>General).
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_8_TEXT: Which Device are you using? (Brand, Model, Operating system)
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_9_TEXT: Which Server are you playing on?
FEEDBACK_BUGS_QUESTION_10_TEXT: Please attach evidence. This can be an image upload, a direct link to an image or a youtube link.
MOVE_DESCRIPTION: üé§ Move a member or all members to another voice channel.
MOVE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}move #channel @user @user** ~ Moves the users mentioned to the channel.
**{{prefix}}move #channel #new-channel** ~ Moves ALL the users in channel to the new channel.
BAN_DESCRIPTION: Bans a user from the server.
BAN_USAGE: **{{prefix}}ban @user reason to ban the user** ~ Bans a user with the reason provided.
**{{prefix}}ban @user** ~ Bans a user with no reason provided. NOT RECOMMENDED!
`Note:` You can replace @ user with a user id to ban someone who is not on your server.
KICK_DESCRIPTION: Kicks a user from the server.
NICK_DESCRIPTION: Easily change the nickname of a member on your server.
SPY_DESCRIPTION: Manages the words you want to spy on, on your servers.
SPY_USAGE: **{{prefix}}spy** ~ Lists all the words available for you.
**{{prefix}}spy add word** ~ Adds this word to your list of words to be notified about when someone types it.
**{{prefix}}spy remove word** ~ Removes this word from your list of words.
NOTE_DESCRIPTION: Give a user a note on your server.
NOTE_USAGE: Notes are essentially private warnings that are not sent to the user. This is an easy way to share information inside a mod team about other users.
**{{prefix}}note @user note you want to leave** ~ Gives a user a note and adds the reason to the mod log.
MODLOG_DESCRIPTION: Check the modlogs for a user on your server.
MODLOG_CLEAR_DESCRIPTION: Clear a members entire modlog history.
MODLOG_CLEAR_USAGE: **{{prefix}}modlog clear @user** ~ Delete all the mod logs for this user.
MODLOG_EDIT_DESCRIPTION: Change the reason for one of the mod logs.
MODLOG_EDIT_USAGE: **{{prefix}}modlog edit 23 my new reason** ~ Edits a modlog using the case id number.
MODLOG_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a mod log case from the database.
MODLOG_REMOVE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}modlog remove 23** ~ Deletes the mod log case with id of 23.
UNBAN_DESCRIPTION: Unbans a user from the server.
UNBAN_USAGE: **{{prefix}}unban @user reason to unban the user** ~ Unbans a user with the reason provided.
WARN_USAGE: **{{prefix}}warn @user reason to warn** ~ Warns a member.
MUTE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent a member from accessing your server.
MUTE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mute @user reason to mute** ~ Mutes a member forever.
**{{prefix}}mute @user 1d12h30m reason to mute** ~ Mutes a member for a certain time period.
UNMUTE_DESCRIPTION: Unmutes a member on your server.
UNMUTE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}unmute @user reason to mute** ~ Unmutes a member.
PURGE_DESCRIPTION: Purges a certain amount of messages.
PURGE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}purge [#] @user** ~ deletes x messages from that user
**{{prefix}}purge [#] bots** ~ deletes x messages from all bots
**{{prefix}}purge [#] images** ~ deletes x messages with attachments
MIRRORS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your mirrors which help copy messages from one channel to another, even to another server.
MIRRORS_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mirrors** ~ View all your current mirrors for this server.
MIRRORS_EDIT_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel delete on** ~ Turns on the delete option for your mirror. This will delete the messages in the source channel allowing you to keep it private.
**{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel delete off** ~ Turns off the delete option for your mirror.
**{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel anonymous on** ~ Turns on the anonymous option for your mirror. This will allow the messages to hide which user sent the message originally.
**{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel anonymous off** ~ Turns off the anonymous option for your mirror.
**{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel images on** ~ Turns on the images option for your mirror. This will ONLY mirror messages with images.
**{{prefix}}mirrors edit #channel images off** ~ Turns off the images option for your mirror.
MIRRORS_CREATE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mirrors create #channel** ~ Creates a mirror to copy all messages sent in the current channel to the new channel you provided.
**{{prefix}}mirrors create #channelID** ~ Allows you to create a mirror to copy all messages sent in current channel to a channel on another server.
`NOTE:` You must be ADMIN on both servers to make it work cross server.
MIRRORS_SETUP_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mirrors setup confessions** ~ Creates a confessions system where users can confess anything they like.

MAIL_DESCRIPTION: The best mod mail ever! Manage it all here.
MAIL_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mail Hi, I need help** ~ Send a new mail to the server staff!
MAIL_RATING: How would you rate this support team on this mail?
MAIL_VOTE_NOW: You have only 2 minutes to vote.
MAIL_VOTE: {{emoji}} {{mention}}, the user **{{username}}** has rated this mail.
MAIL_SILENT_CLOSE: Closed the mail silently. The user was not alerted.
MAIL_EXAMPLE_MAIL: Hi, this is an example mail I have created on your behalf. Feel free to test it out to learn how to use the mail system.
MAIL_NEW_MAIL_IN_DM: A mail can not be created in a direct message with the bot. Please create the mail from a server first.
MAIL_NEED_MAIL_ID: You have too many mails open at this time. Please tell me which mail you wish to respond to by providing its ID number.
MAIL_REPLY_SENT_SUPPORT: Your mail has been sent to the support team.
MAIL_DEFAULT_AUTO_RESPONSE: Thank you for contacting us. This is an automated response. I have @ the team. They will respond as soon as possible. In the meantime, if you feel you need to send more information, feel free to use the mail command below to send more messages.
MAIL_GREAT: {{emoji}} {{mention}}, **Your support is top tier!  Fantastic work!** The user `{{username}}` has rated your feedback.
MAIL_OK: {{emoji}} {{mention}}, `{{username}}` has found your help to be **OK**. Let's try and learn and see how we can do better next time.
MAIL_NOT_GOOD: {{emoji}} {{mention}}, **Not good!** The `{{username}}` was not satisfied with the support given this time. Let's learn from what we did and can try to improve for next time.
MAIL_BAD: {{emoji}} {{mention}}, You've been rated by `{{username}}` as very **bad**. If this was a troll, feel free to ignore it but otherwise think of how you can improve your responses to obtain better ratings!
MAIL_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION: üì™ Close a mail with a reason that is sent to the user.
MAIL_CLOSE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mail close message to send to user here**
MAIL_REPLY_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mail reply anonymous your reply here** ~ This will send an anonymous mail so it does not tell the user which user replied.
**{{prefix}}mail reply your message here** ~ Reply to the mail.
MAIL_SILENT_USAGE: **{{prefix}}mail silent** ~ Silently close the mail without alerting the user it was closed.

EMBED_USAGE: ¬ª `Possible variables that you can use in embeds:`
**%authorimage%** ~ Displays the authors image in an image field.
**%userimage%** ~ Displays the activating users' image in an image field.
**%guildimage%** ~ Displays the server's image in an image field.
¬ª User variables only work when mentioning a user together with the command.
CREATE YOUR EMBED OBJECT ON THIS WEBSITE: https://embedbuilder.nadekobot.me/. Note: You can also create an embed with the .embedset command.
EMBED_EDIT_USAGE: **{{prefix}}embed edit #channel [message ID] { code here }** ~ Allows you to edit an embed in another channel. If the message is in the same channel, you do not need to provide the channel.
EMBED_SHOW_DESCRIPTION: Shows the embed code for an embed.
EMBED_SHOW_USAGE: **{{prefix}}embed show #channel [message ID]** ~ View the JSON code for this embed.
TAG_DESCRIPTION: View all the tags on your server.
TAG_CREATE_USAGE: **{{prefix}}tag create name basic { code }** ~ Create a basic tag. A basic tag will require that the name be the very first word in the message to work.
**{{prefix}}tag create name advanced { code }** ~ Create a advanced tag. An advanced tag will work if anywhere in the message this word exists.

**{{prefix}}tag create name random url url url url** ~ Create a random tag. An random tag work similar to a basic tag but it will send one of the options you provided at random. Using URLs, you can make a custom command for any gif.
TAG_INSTALL_DESCRIPTION: ‚¨áÔ∏è Install/Download the publically available tags from another server.
TAG_INSTALL_USAGE: **{{prefix}}tag install [Server ID]** ~ Installs the public tags from the server id provided.
`Note:` VIP's can request custom names for their server ids be added as modules so users can install the tags such as `{{prefix}}tag install aov`
TAG_PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: üÜô Make tags public so they can be installed by other servers.
TAG_PUBLIC_USAGE: **{{prefix}}tag public name name name** ~ Mark as many tags as you'd like to be public. Public tags can then be installed by other servers.

TAG_UNINSTALL_DESCRIPTION: üóëÔ∏è Uninstall the tags from a server.
SETUP_DESCRIPTION: Used to setup the bot for your server's specific needs.
SETUP_PREPARING: Please hold on, I am preparing the setup zone! I will @ you shortly once I'm ready.
SETUP_BEGIN: {{mention}}, Thank you for using Gamer, the best bot on Discord. This channel was created for the setup process as it can get quite spammy. Once the setup is complete this channel can be deleted.
SETUP_SUBSCRIBE_QUESTION: {{mention}}, Would you like to subscribe to the most important messages from my developers? We can have those messages sent to a channel here. For example, new features, updates, maintaince, privacy policy, terms of service, or any security update alerts.
SETUP_NEED_CHANNEL: Please provide a #channel or type `no` to skip or type `q` to quit the setup process.
SETUP_CANCELLED: You have successfully cancelled the setup process.
SETUP_COUNTING_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup the counting game where you can compete against other servers or team vs team?
SETUP_CONFESSIONALS_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup a confession channel where people can confess their sins? Or just things they carry around them daily. Fully anonym!
SETUP_VERIFICATION_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup a verficiation system on your discord? Your server can't be raided easily and it keeps everything more secure.
SETUP_URLFILTER_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup the URL filter? You can block certain URLs or block every URL and allow just some of them.
SETUP_PROFANITY_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup the profanity filter? You can choose between a soft and a strict filter and you can easily add or remove words or whole phrases.
SETUP_CAPITALS_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup the CAPITALS FILTER? At a certain percentage the message gets deleted and reposted as lower capitals or the user gets warned.
SETUP_FEEDBACK_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup the feedback feature? With this feature your users can send you ideas or bugs about almost everything on yoru server or game.
SETUP_MUTE_SETUP: {{mention}}, Would you like to setup a muted role? Users with this role can't type or talk. You can either choose one of your roles or the bot creates one for you and edit the permissions.
SETUP_TODO_SETUP: Alright, next would you like to set up the To Do List Manager feature to your server? This feature can help you increase productivity and efficieny of your server. Assign tasks to users and rank them with priorities to help users know to finish their assigned tasks.

**{{prefix}}events create templateName** ~ Create a new event based on a existing template.
EVENTS_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: üóëÔ∏è Delete an event on your server.

**{{prefix}}events join # position** ~ Joins the event to the specific position for this event.
EVENTS__DESCRIPTION: ‚úÖ Joins the event to a specific position that the events require. If no space, you will be added to the waiting list specifically for this position.

EVENTS_EDIT_DESCRIPTION_DESCRIPTION: üñäÔ∏è Edit the description of the event.

EVENTS_EDIT_REPEAT_DESCRIPTION: üñäÔ∏è Edit whether or not this event is repeating.

**{{prefix}}events edit repeat # off** ~ Disables the event from repeat.
EVENTS_EDIT_START_DESCRIPTION: üñäÔ∏è Edit the time when this event will start.
EVENTS_EDIT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: üñäÔ∏è Edit the title of the event.
